reference-wr.title: Sample Templates for HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade
reference-wr.shortdesc: You can evaluate selected features of Heat using sample templates. The samples also demonstrate some HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade extensions.

section.p: Sample Heat templates are included with the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade SDK. A brief description is provided for each sample. For more information about the SDK, refer to the Titanium Server Guest Software Development Kit documentation.
The samples are also copied to the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade controllers at system installation. They can be found in the /etc/heat/templates/hot directory.
